alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:49AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist, central Alachua and northern Marion Counties through 1015 AM EST... At 949 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Archer, or 9 miles east of Trenton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, Archer, University Of Florida, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Newberry and Micanopy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion
